labstepR 0.0.2
  • Reference

Create a Resource on Labstep

createResource.Rd

This function allows you to create a resource on Labstep.

createResource(user, name)

Arguments

user

A labstep user object. Must contain an `api_key` field. Returned from `login` command.
name

The name you want to give your resource

Value

Returns a `resource` object

Examples

user <- login("demo@labstep.com","demopassword")
resource <- createResource(user,'My First Resource')
print(resource)
#> $id
#> [1] 392824
#> 
#> $created_at
